column5: Hello OFC’ers,  I have been a member for a couple of years now but was not reading the forum very often. You all seem to have a great deal of experience in what I call my favorite pastime (fishing that is). Thanks to everyone for providing such great info, I hope to be able to provide some as well now that I am on this forum more often.  Many of my fishing stories have been up in Algonquin Park, this is where I find my solitude and get in some great fishing. I only have a canoe so gotta keep off the main drag. My buddy and I started ice fishing about 5 yrs ago and have been going up to Temagami ever since … with side trips to Simcoe and Haliburton. We are headed up to Temagami next week for the laker opener and I hope to share my report and pics with y’all. Last year I was lucky enough to get 5 species over 4 days (laker, whitefish, ling, cisco and pickerel)… you just never know whats comin up that hole …LOL cheers
Awsome...and welcome.  Great place here. looking forward to your reports and fish porn!
Nice to have your input Jds, look forward to more.  Good luck next week.
I'm glad you took the time to (re)introduce yourself. I look forward to a productive Temagami report.
